question:
Present simple    add the right question tag
1. it's sunny today, isn't it
2. they don't go to the party
3. sandra gets up late,
4. my parents don't like me
5. peter has got a twin sister
6. i am your teacher
7. i'm not your slave
8. she doesn't care about them
9. your cat is brown,
10. you aren't french
11. peter and paul don't like pop music,
12. mary and her brother are nice.
13. this school isn't big.
14. he works overtime,
15. you don't like fish,​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. it's sunny today, isn't it

2. they don't go to the party, do they?

3. sandra gets up late, doesn't she?

4. my parents don't like me, do they?

5. peter has got a twin sister, hasn't he?

6. i am your teacher, aren't I / ain't I ?

7. i'm not your slave, am I?

8. she doesn't care about them, does she?

9. your cat is brown, isn't it?

10. you aren't french, are you?

11. peter and paul don't like pop music, do they?

12. mary and her brother are nice. aren't they?

13. this school isn't big, is it?

14. he works overtime, doesn't he?

15. you don't like fish, do you?

Penjelasan:

Idk whether its true or not, but I hope it can help you,

sorry If I'm wrong, gudluck :)

related_questions.question:
The adorable eyelashes, are quality of animals?    a Zebras
b. Tiger
c. Giraffes
d. Elephants

yg mana? 

di follow yah ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

sebenarnya aku tidak bisa bantu jawab tapi,cara jawabnya itu yang di kotak bacaan "you" ada bacaan "time" jadi kamu tulis jamnya, dan bacaan "activities" kamu tulis aktivitas kamu pada jam itu, terus yang ada bacaan "your friend" itu aktivitas dan waktu dari teman kamu, "wake up" artinya bangun tidur

Penjelasan:

kalau kurang jelas silahkan tanyakan lagi..... :)

related_questions.question:
5. i saw an accident last night. somebody ……..an ambulance but nobody …… so the ambulance ………..    a. called – was injured – wasn’t needed
b. called – injured – didn’t need 
c. was called – was injured – wasn’t needed 
d. called – injured – wasn’t needed

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed

Penjelasan:

I saw an accident last night. Somebody called an ambulance but nobody was injured so the ambulance wasn't needed. (Aku melihat sebuah kecelakaan tadi malam. Seseorang menelepon sebuah ambulans namun tidak ada yang terluka sehingga ambulans tersebut tidak diperlukan)

Karena dia di masa lalu, maka kita gunakan simple past Dan past perfect.

V1 V2 V3

Call Called Called

  • Untuk kesatu, kita gunakan Called karena kalimat tersebut lebih sesuai dengan kata called.
  • Untuk kedua, kita gunakan Was Injured karena pada bagian tersebut lebih logis bila diartikan sebagai "tidak ada yang terluka/nobody was injured" dibandingkan "tidak ada terluka/nobody injured"
  • Untuk ketiga, kita gunakan Wasn't Needed karena artinya adalah tidak diperlukan sedangkan jawaban yang tidak tepat adalah didn't need karena artinya tidak perlu.

Jadi jawaban yang tepat adalah

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed

related_questions.question:
34. A. go B. went C. going D. gone    35. A. stay B. stays C. staying D. stayed

36. A. enjoy B. enjoyed C. enjoying D. enjoys

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

34. B. Went

35. D. Stayed

36. B. Enjoyed

Penjelasan: Simple Past Tense menggunakan kata kerja bentuk ke dua atau Verb 2

go-went

stay-stayed

enjoy-enjoyed

hope you find this helpful^•^

Jawaban:

34.went

35stayed

36enjoyed

Penjelasan:

semua dlm bentuk simple past tense krn sdh lampau

maaf ya kak kalau saya tidak bisa jawab!

related_questions.question: When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

Penjelasan:

Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Passive dari Simple Past Tense:

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.
